FuncDef:
The cgn-pub-user auto-cut enable command enables automatic switchback from public IP address-based access to private IP address-based access for CGN public network users.
The undo cgn-pub-user auto-cut enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, automatic switchback from public IP address-based access to private IP address-based access is disabled, and you need to perform a manual switchback.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a CGN service board fails, CGN users cannot access the device using a private IP address. In this situation, you can configure public IP address-based access for them to ensure that they can get online. After the CGN service board recovers, public IP address-based access can be switched back to private IP address-based access.
During the switching, CGN users using public IP addresses need to go offline and obtain private IP addresses to go online.
To enable automatic switchback, run the cgn-pub-user auto-cut enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
